posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rick McQuillan
SOLD, THANK YOU!
I am selling a single page from a December 1889 magazine.  (Youth's Companion?)  The page is about 6 1/4 x 9 1/2, and the top half of the page contains a woodcut ad for -

Baseball At Home
Williams Popular Indoor Game

52 cards, Endorsed by Buck Ewing.  

The woodcut shows a portrait of Ewing, and a game showing some unkown players.


PayPal is preferred, but checks and money orders are fine.

$35 shipped.

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g9/buymycards/EWING001.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g9/buymycards/EWING.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Lyman
Rick, please see separate email.  Thanks, Lyman
